summary: An Ordinance authorizing the City Treasurer to refund the sum of One and 60/100 ($1.60) Dollars from Local Improvement District Fund No. 1533, Ordinance No. 16615, to M. F. Sharpless No. 1320 Terry Avenue, City, which amount was paid in error by the said Sharpless, in excess of his actual amount of assessment levied for the improvement of Greenlake District of North Trunk Sewer, comprising the above district.
